long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kiipu is a tool designed to help you efficiently save and manage bookmarks. It arranges each webpage into a card format and offers various display options for different types of web content, enabling you to easily retrieve and organize bookmarks with a single glance.

Additionally, it supports cross-platform functionality, allowing you to access your bookmarks anytime, anywhere, whether on a computer or mobile phone ğŸ‘€.

If you're someone who loves collecting bookmarks and enjoys saving intriguing or useful webpages in your browser, then this tool is definitely worth a try ğŸŒŸ~
